name: Aerial Sight
description:
Game Description

Fly above the clouds and protect your planet from the space invaders in this side scrolling shooter that pays homage to retro games from consoles like Atari and Intellivision!

This game is our submission to the Game Dev Insiders Jam #2 (https://itch.io/jam/gamedev-insiders-jam-2), with the theme FLY.

How to Play
  • Move your ship using WASD or Arrow Keys in the keyboard.
  • Shoot using the space bar
  • Kill enemies or destroy fuel boxes to gain points
  • If you run out of fuel or get hit 3 times, it's game over
Our team

Lucas Sampaio (https://digitalcatgames.itch.io) (https://twitter.com/DigitalCatGames) - Programmer

Paulo Serafim (https://byronico.itch.io/) - Sound Engineer and Composer

Azad Rouhani (https://veggiebad.itch.io) - Digital Artist

Asset credits

The font used in the game is Azonix, done by https://twitter.com/mixofx.
